name: PixiCubes: Jigsaw with a Twist
description:
PixiCubes is a puzzle game with a twist. Literally. Rotate cubes in a grid to create an image. PixiCubes come in two flavors: Riddle Cubes reveal a fact or fun riddle that points you to the correct picture. Theme Cubes show you the picture, then scramble it for you to solve. Get trophies for solving PixiCubes. Each one has 6-sides. It's like a jigsaw puzzle but with 6 sides! How fast can you finish one? Gotta solve 'em all!
